metadata.name: Denis (+11 unlocks) [RGON]
metadata.description:
[b]This mod requires REPENTOGON, it will not function properly without it![/b]
Say hello to [u]Denis[/u] (and his offspring)!
[h2]Denis' Mechanics[/h2]
Denis can't fire tears and must instead rely on his horde of Minisaacs to attack for him. - He can charge up to mitose a new Minisaac, and can have more Minisaacs the higher his firerate is. - His Minisaacs copy tear effects, and certain Minisaacs are guaranteed to fire some tear effects. - He can pick up and throw Minisaacs by pressing the [DROP] key near them.
The mod contains 11 unlocks for Denis, and full compatibility with the [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=836319872]EID[/url] and [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3404171769]Accurate Blurbs[/url] mods!
[h2]Credits[/h2] spoop - Literally everything Conboi - Achievement papers for Amoeba and Mitochondria Special thanks to "eiffel 65", "Team Floorbirth 3", "Teams Vs Projects 2: It's About Time", "Project Team", "Team Chocolate 5", "Team Li Yuwen 3", "Trans Vs Politicians 2: It's About T", "Team AltVerz", "Inklings Vs Octarians 2: It's About Squids", "Trains Vs Polynesians 2: It's About Rails", "Team Project", "Chocolate Vs Milkshake 2: It's About MOD",
